scripts.pre-deploy: yarn run cleanup && rm -rf index.js node_modules package.json yarn.lock .babelrc .nvmrc && cp -r webflow/* . && rm -rf webflow
scripts.deploy: git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && yarn pre-deploy && yarn copy && git add -A && git commit -m 'upd' && git push -f && git checkout master
